segments.text: I really need to find a bus that goes by PCC .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where do you need to catch this bus at ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All the way up on Las Flores Drive and Fair Oaks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can tell you what bus to catch , but you have to walk a little bit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Walking isn't a problem for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The 267 stops at Altadena Drive and Fair Oaks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Get on the bus heading west .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know where I get off at ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for letting me know , home-girl .
segments.speaker: S1
